(Simplified: 鹛)
Chinese Definition:
①鳥類的一屬，眼周圍的羽毛像畫的眉毛，叫的聲音好聽。“畫眉”即是鶥屬。

鶥字的基本解释

鶥
méi
见“鹛”。

鶥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méi］
［《廣韻》武悲切，平脂，明。］
“鹛1”的繁体字。
画眉亚科各类鸟的通称。羽毛多为棕褐色。嘴尖。尾长。鸣声婉转。食虫，为益鸟。可笼饲。我国常见的有棕颈钩嘴鹛、红顶鹛、黑脸噪鹛等。

鶥字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶥； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1495第11
【廣韻】武悲切【集韻】旻悲切，?音眉。【玉篇】鶥鴰，鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】作麋鴰。

鶥字的源字形

暂无。

Babbler
Basic explanation of words
Babbler
méi
See "Babbler".
Babbler
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méi］
["Guangyun" Wu Beiqie, Pingzhi, Ming. ]
Traditional characters for "鹛1".
The general term for all kinds of birds in the subfamily Thrush. The feathers are mostly brown. Tip of the mouth. Tail length. The humming sound is tactful. Insectivorous, beneficial bird. Can be caged. Common in our country are the brown-necked hook-billed babbler, the red-topped babbler, and the black-faced babbler.
Babbler

[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹛; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1495 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Wu Beiqie [Jiyun] Min mournfully, and the eyebrows. [Jade articles] Babbler, bird name. 【Erya·Shiniao】As an elk.
